ROOT.QUERY: SELECT invoicenumber "Invoice #", to_char(invoicedate,''MM/DD/RR'') "Invoice date", (SELECT foucnuf || '' | '' || foulibl FROM foudgene@heinens_custom_prod, fouadres@heinens_custom_prod WHERE foucfin=fadcfin AND FADACCI=vendordunsnumber AND ROWNUM=1) "Supplier code desc.", productid "UPC", itemdescription "Item desc.", qtyinvoiced "Qty invoiced", unitprice "Gross", ''Unknown UPC in GOLD'' "Comment" FROM im_edi_invoice_detail@heinens_custom_prod art WHERE TRUNC(invoicedate)=TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND status_no=2 AND importbatchid > 4946000 AND NVL(qtyinvoiced,0) > 0 /*AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM artcoca@heinens_custom_prod, artuv@heinens_custom_prod WHERE arccinv=arvcinv AND (arccode LIKE substr(productid, 2, length(productid) - 1) || ''%'' OR arccode LIKE substr(productid, 1, length(productid) - 1)) AND TRUNC(SYSDATE+7) BETWEEN arcddeb AND arcdfin UNION SELECT 1 FROM artcoul@heinens_custom_prod, artrac@heinens_custom_prod WHERE acucinr=artcinr AND (acucode LIKE substr(productid, 2, length(productid) - 1) || ''%'' OR acucode LIKE substr(productid, 1, length(productid) - 1)) AND TRUNC(SYSDATE+7) BETWEEN acuddeb AND acudfin) */
